metadata.title: CVE-2024-10525 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto, from version 1.3.2 through 2.0.18, if a maliciousbroker sends a crafted SUBACK packet with no reason codes, a client usinglibmosquitto may make out of bounds memory access when acting in itson_subscribe callback. This affects the mosquitto_sub and mosquitto_rrclients.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
